titles: By the King. A proclamation to restrain the abuses of hackney coaches in the cities of London, and Westminster, and the suburbs thereof
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)

notes: Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Whitehall the eighteenth day of October, in the twelfth year of Our Reign.
